captions.text:
You should all be
very proud of yourselves.

Each and every one of you
has been hand-picked

To represent our inaugural
pledge class.

Just got a little
overexcited. Sorry.

At this point
you may be asking yourself,

"why's the other end
of this string

Do you trust that
we've provided you

With enough slack so your block
will land safely on the lawn?

That I do not want
to see you die tonight?

Blue, you're my boy!
Thank you, sir.

[ frank: ]
wasn't meant to happen
like that, weensie!

[ beanie: ]
walk it off, big guy.
We're coming down.

title: Old School (7/9) Movie CLIP - The Cinder Block Test (2003) HD
